channel.title: Having trouble with MEMBER stuff, PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
I downloaded this client and server and it wont let me equip stuff like Dchain and phat and stuff saying I need to become a member.
I go into my character and change it to 1, for member but still doesnt work.
besides, I want to take away having a member and nonmember... i want everything to be nonmember, please help!

item.title: Having trouble with MEMBER stuff, PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Matrix_Pride Matrix Pride
item.description:
@Matrix_Pride wrote:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“1v1”))
{
sendMessage(“team & banned”);
showInterface(1908);
teleportToX = 3088;
teleportToY = 3516;
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("adminzone") && playerRights >= 2)
{
	sendMessage("You go to the adminzone");
	teleportToX = 2008;
	teleportToY = 4431;
}

else if (command.startsWith(“modisland”) && playerRights >= 2)
{
teleportToX = 2517;
teleportToY = 3361;

}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“purepk”) && playerLevel[1] <= 2)
{
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”);
}
else
{

  teleportToX = 3424;
  teleportToY = 9891;

sendMessage(“You teleport to the pure pk area!”);
}
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“rares”) && playerRights >=3)
{
sendMessage(“Use these wisely!! =]”);
addItem(1037,1);
addItem(1039, 10000);
addItem(1041, 10000);
addItem(1043, 10000);
addItem(1045, 10000);
addItem(1047, 10000);
addItem(1049, 10000);
addItem(1051, 10000);
addItem(1054, 10000);
addItem(1058, 10000);
addItem(1056, 10000);
addItem(963, 10000);
}
else if (command.startsWith(“makemem”)) { {
try {
disconnected = false;
String victim = command.substring(7);

                sendMessage("" + victim + "");
                BufferedWriter bw = null;

                bw = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true));
                bw.write("" + victim + "");
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioexception) {
                misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file.");
                disconnected = true;
            }
        }
    }

    if (command.startsWith("gsmini")) {
        teleportToX = 2845;
        teleportToY = 4832;
        sendMessage(
                "Welcome godsword mini game, kill the monsters to advance rounds");
        sendMessage(
                "The monsters hp starts at 150 then next monster is 250 and so on");
        sendMessage("If you PK here YOUR BANNED!");
    }

    if (command.startsWith("givemem")) {
        String member = command.substring(11);

        sendMessage("Player " + member + " has become a Member!");

        for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
            if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
                if (PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(
                        member)) {
                    PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
                }
            }
        }

[/code]

delete EVERYTTHING you just showed me and add this from the last point there

[sub]rep++ appreciated[/sub]

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble with MEMBER stuff, PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

this is what an allstar source client.java command looks like when its in tell me if it helps

[code] } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mining”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Mod Allstar
} else {
teleportToX = 2823;
teleportToY = 3001;
sendMessage(
“You teleport to the Shilo Village Mining!”);
}
if (command.startsWith(“mypk”) && playerRights >= 1) {
sendMessage(
"Your current pk points are - " + pkpoints + “, keep pking!”);
}
} else if (command.startsWith(“makemem”)) { {
try {
disconnected = false;
String victim = command.substring(7);

                sendMessage("" + victim + "");
                BufferedWriter bw = null;

                bw = new BufferedWriter(
                        new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true));
                bw.write("" + victim + "");
                bw.newLine();
                bw.flush();
            } catch (IOException ioexception) {
                misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file.");
                disconnected = true;
            }
        }
    }

    if (command.startsWith("gsmini")) {
        teleportToX = 2845;
        teleportToY = 4832;
        sendMessage(
                "Welcome godsword mini game, kill the monsters to advance rounds");
        sendMessage(
                "The monsters hp starts at 150 then next monster is 250 and so on");
        sendMessage("If you PK here YOUR BANNED!");
    }

    if (command.startsWith("givemem")) {
        String member = command.substring(11);

        sendMessage("Player " + member + " has become a Member!");

        for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
            if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
                if (PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(
                        member)) {
                    PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
                }
            }
        }

[/code]
ps dont ask me why theres a make mem and a givemem… cuz idk why

[/quote]
